p: The Spanish National Statistical Institute (INE) was queried about all fatalities in Spain resulting from contact with hornets, wasps, and bees (ICD-10 code X23). The INE is a legally independent administrative autonomous institution assigned to the Ministry of Economy, Industry, and Competivity via the Secretary of State for the Economy and Business Support. The INE is responsible for assembling causes of death as well as other epidemiologic data from death certificates in Spain.
